public class InfoPanel
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.DecoratedPopupPanel
implements com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasText, com.google.gwt.user.client.WindowResizeListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PopupListener

Displays information in the bottom region of the browser for a specified amount of time.

Author:
luciano.broussal(at)gmail.com
